basics.name: Óscar Bustos Garrido
basics.label: Frontend Developer with over 12 years of experience in Web Development.
basics.summary: Frontend Developer with over 12 years of experience building scalable and high-quality web applications. I specialize in React, Astro, and Next.js, with a strong focus on performance, component-based architectures, and automated testing (Jest, Cypress). I have led frontend teams, improved developer workflows, and optimized user experiences across various industries. Passionate about functional programming, code quality, and AI-driven solutions.

work.name: FCM Travel
work.summary: FCM Travel is a leading corporate travel management platform trusted by global brands such as P&G and Toyota. The platform is designed to streamline business travel with cutting-edge technology, offering a seamless experience for users while providing valuable insights and strategic solutions. Known for its collaborative approach, FCM combines a talented international team with agile methodologies to deliver a product that meets the evolving needs of modern businesses.
responsibilities: Led a complete restyling of the platform, collaborating with design and product teams to enhance user experience.
Developed a custom component library with ReactJS and implemented it across the entire platform.
Worked with Next.js, SASS, and GraphQL, optimizing performance with Server-Side Rendering (SSR).
Integrated Cypress to ensure high-quality standards through automated testing.
Collaborated within agile squads, fostering innovation and adaptability in development workflows.

work.name: Marketgoo
work.summary: Led frontend development on new projects, implementing a component-based architecture that reduced development time and improved maintainability. Introduced an automated testing strategy (Jest, Cypress) that significantly decreased production bugs. Collaborated closely with design and product teams to enhance user experiences. Integrated AI-driven features to improve content recommendations. Ensured API consistency and performance optimization. Mentored new developers and advocated for functional programming principles.

work.name: urbanData Analytics
work.summary: I led a refactor of the company's main product in record time while maintaining the previous one. We migrated from a monolithic architecture to a more flexible and optimized one that improved performance and user experience. I promoted good practices and performance improvements. I increased test coverage and code quality. I created an open-source component library for ReactJS that increased development speed and visual consistency of the application. I accompanied the design and product teams in the creation of new features. I mentored new developers. I used technologies like ReactJS, Typescript, Styled Components, Jest, Cypress, and Git.
